steps.name: Warm-Up March
steps.instructions: Light marching in place, shoulders relaxed, breathe deeply.

steps.name: Arm Circles
steps.instructions: Small circles forward then backward, keep core engaged.

steps.name: Bodyweight Squats
steps.instructions: Feet shoulder-width, sit hips back, chest up.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Shake out legs and breathe.

steps.name: Reverse Lunges
steps.instructions: Alternate legs, step back softly, knee tracks over toes.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Recover and reset stance.

steps.name: Push-Ups
steps.instructions: Hands under shoulders, full-body plank. Knees down if needed.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Relax shoulders and wrists.

steps.name: Glute Bridges
steps.instructions: Drive through heels, squeeze glutes at top.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Deep breaths.

steps.name: Plank Hold
steps.instructions: Elbows under shoulders, keep hips level.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Drop knees and recover.

steps.name: Alternating Dead Bug
steps.instructions: Lower opposite arm/leg slowly while bracing core.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Reset breathing.

steps.name: Mountain Climbers
steps.instructions: Drive knees forward with controlled pace.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Shake out and hydrate if needed.

steps.name: Superman Lifts
steps.instructions: Lift chest and legs gently, squeeze upper back.

steps.name: Rest
steps.instructions: Relax lower back.

steps.name: Standing Side Bends
steps.instructions: Reach long through side body, alternate sides.

steps.name: Cooldown Breathing
steps.instructions: Slow inhale through nose, long exhale through mouth.
